org.apache.mesos.offer

Class OfferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.offer.OfferUtils

  • public class OfferUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides commonly used utilities for offer handling.

    • Method Detail

      • filterOutAcceptedOffers

        public static java.util.List<Protos.Offer> filterOutAcceptedOffers(java.util.List<Protos.Offer> offers,
                                                                   java.util.Collection<Protos.OfferID> acceptedOfferIds)
        Filters out accepted offers and returns back a list of unused offers.
        Parameters:
        offers - An org.apache.mesos.Protos.Offer collection containing both ACCEPTED and UNACCEPTED offers.
        acceptedOfferIds - A collection of OfferIDs that are already ACCEPTED.
        Returns:
        A List of offers are that not ACCEPTED yet; can be empty if there are no UNACCEPTED offers left.

      • isOfferAccepted

        public static boolean isOfferAccepted(Protos.Offer offer,
                                      java.util.Collection<Protos.OfferID> acceptedOfferIds)
        Determines if a certain offer is part of the accepted OfferID collection.
        Parameters:
        offer - An org.apache.mesos.Protos.Offer that needs to be checked for acceptance.
        acceptedOfferIds - A Collection of accepted org.apache.mesos.Protos.OfferID.
        Returns:
        true if org.apache.mesos.Protos.Offer is accepted; false otherwise.
